text: Sir Alexander Roy Asplin Beldam, PC (29 March 1925 â€“ 16 October 2020) was a British judge. He was Lord Justice of Appeal in England and Wales from 1989 until 2000. He was also a Bencher of the Inner Temple. He died on 16 October 2020 at the age of 95.Beldam ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Law lords
